title: Gameplay is stale and boring
body:
And its all pretty predictable. You see champions like {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:104}} you know they are probably doing to do at least okay if not very well.  

The match up variety is boring. The game has gotten pretty boring. 

But HEY, they are going to introduce some whacky new items and reworks that definitely won't create unforeseen balance issues! Right?

replies.body: I'm searching for my next favorite game...but sure would be nice if Riot pulled its head out of its ass so I could still enjoy this one.
maybe it isnt riot that needs to pull their head out of their ass ?
Yeah its me, the customers fault. How dare I not be satisfied as a customer!

its a free game right? you dont have to give riot any $$$ to play?

oh btw i dont see any of those champs normally... 

didnt see any of them my last game

You are so out of line. Free to play generates more money to play to play. So lets not put Riot on some pedestal as if F2P is somehow a great service to customers.  If anything, its a huge disservice to gamers who would have no problem paying a fee to play, and knowing that at the very least, balance changes are not being made to drive RP sales. 

And furthermore, when the game meta starts so suck and there are tons of issues, I have a right to be upset without people saying just move on. We have invested time and sometimes money into the game. We don't want to have all of that be a waste because Riot wants to get stupid.

If we didn't play the game, Riot wouldn't make money. We are customers and like any customer of any service or product we shouldn't be shut down for complaining, as if we are just supposed to walk away from years of a hobby without first trying to see if they company will fix the problems.

they make money for ads on their pro scene ... they make money on micro transactions in game.. suchs as RP for skins and champs which you dont have to spend any money to actually play

so to say you have to pay to play is out of line and completely wrong

Haha do you really think most of their money they make is not make from micro transactions ?You are of touch dude. 

10s of Millions of players spending $5 here, $10 there a few times a year perhaps or more...if you can't see how that can easily turn into hundreds of millions or more, you must have failed math.

that $5 , $10 is the micro transactions i mentioned ... 

but you dont have to spend any money at all to play the game... 

ill wait for you to proof to me that you have to buy something through RIOT to play their game ?
So basically you are saying that because some people don't spend money and some do spend money, no one who plays is allowed to complain about the game? Fuck off dude.
see you cant prove me wrong... and i never said you cant complain... now you are wanting to act childish and result to insults...

Ultimately its your point, even if you don't directly say it. You bring up the free to play to try to marginalize me, and also implying I am the problem and not Riot. Fuck off is not a childish insult. Its something that if said to your face by a person like me in real life, you would shrink away.

no my very 1st comment to you on your post as you {{item:3070}} over this game is to find something else to play... nothing more nothing less if you arent enjoying it dont play... but you wanna throw your fit and draw attention and say things like riot needs to pull their head out of their ass and so on... none of it is needed nor productive to anything but showing you acting like a child. and from this exchange we have had seems you are just pissy in general maybe that is why you arent having fun with this game. maybe you arent having fun cuz you take it to seriously instead of just playing for the fun and enjoyment of the game.hence why my comment was maybe it isnt riot that needs to pull their head out of their ass came about. every one wants to talk shit and cry how horrible the game is but i dont see you uninstalling and deleting your account. but riot created a game that is free to play... you dont have to any money at all on this game to play. you dont need to grandstand and create all this BS if you dont wanna play... just dont.. uninstall and move on

lol figures , you have nothing to stand on any more 

so you gonna uninstall ? or just sit there like a 2 yr old and continue throwing your fit?
The size of your last response bores me. I didn't read it. You have no argument and no point.

Wait, yi is going to do at least OK? What planet are you from? Unless it is very low ELO, yi can fail hard. He's squish and the only thing he has is damage, so if he falls behind or gets cced, RIP yi.
I generally see him do quite well.  Do you disagree with the rest of the champions I mentioned?
if everything goes on pbe first how is every balance issue unforeseen?
Damn good question. They had to buff Aatrox 3 times now after his mini rework despite PBE testing. How do they not realize things? Maybe the company is made up of very unimpressive people.
